channel.title: Saving Variables on Project Czar
channel.description:
How do I save variables on Project Czar?
I tried it a second ago... It didn't have any errors, but it didn't save what it was supposed to save either.
Somebody please just tell me where to put some code and what to put for the variable to save.
If you want to be really nice and write a little snippet of code that I can C & P, here is the variable name: massCountTotal
Thanks in advance, Zach

item.title: Saving Variables on Project Czar
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

I need one too. It saves, but as soon as they disconnect and reconnect, they can reuse it.

Read full topic

item.title: Saving Variables on Project Czar

item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

How do I save variables on Project Czar?

I tried it a second ago… It didn’t have any errors, but it didn’t save what it was supposed to save either.

Somebody please just tell me where to put some code and what to put for the variable to save.
